EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_TorontoOfficeOpening_Q314.Invitation (EMC,VMWare & Pivotal Execs)_
EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive Invitation: Pivotal Toronto, Grand Office Opening (September 25)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
JOIN US FOR AN EVENING OF CELEBRATION! Hello {{lead.First Name:default=}},
On September 25th, 2014, we're opening our doors to celebrate the opening of our new Toronto office space.
To show our appreciation for your support, we'd like to invite you to join industry leaders from across Toronto for an evening of conversation and fun.
Enjoy drinks, hors d'oeuvres and entertainment while networking with innovative leaders across multiple industries.
SPACES ARE LIMITED!
Kindly register to reserve your spot. <http://play.gopivotal.com/Toronto-Office-Opening.html>
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email: elogue@gopivotal.com <mailto:mailto@elogue@gopivotal.com>. EVENT DETAILS PIVOTAL OFFICE 1 Toronto St, 11th Floor Toronto, ON M5C 2V6 Thursday, Sept. 25th 6 p.m. - 9 p.m. REGISTER <http://play.gopivotal.com/Toronto-Office-Opening.html>
